text:
With the removal of the PUT option. Is there any plans to open up more of the communications API?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/communications>

For example let us be able to update hs_communication_channel_type with other values, or HubSpot add more defined values?
This is a fun question, following this thread
Hey <@UQZFM551B>, we do have some things in the works for adding more channels. Is there a specific channel or type that you're interested in?

Hey <@UAVHG3EHG>. That is awesome. I was thinking something for logging external Chat to HubSpot. Or more specifically what made us looking for an alternative is that we're planning to log and update Threads from our GPT's that we've created for our customers
Interesting - do you want those to go into the Conversations Inbox at all? Or just for logging purposes?
That was what we looked at first. But when we looked at the documentation for the Conversattions inbox (BETA) we couldn't add more channels or start a new thread in an existing channel
